task.title: Creating Engaging Design
task.shortdesc: An engaging design is important when making a How To Video because the your video's ability to reel an audience in is ultimately what determines the success of your project.

context.p: This task will help you project a confident and succinct image

step.cmd: State the overall goal of your video.

substep.cmd: This should outline what you want your audience to learn or accomplish.

step.cmd: Move forward in small steps, breaking up your overall goal into smaller, more manageable steps.
Finish by bringing everything together and showing how your steps contribute to the end goal you stated.
